definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: As long as you have the determination and perseverance, no matter what happened can do a good job.
sentences.chinese: 只要你有志氣，有毅力，無論什麼事都能做好。

sentences.english: Meaning of this statement is that there are goal-oriented , people will eventually be successful.
sentences.chinese: 這句話的意思是，有志氣的人終究會成功。

sentences.english: Belong to you , the good child with an ambition outstandingly .
sentences.chinese: 優秀屬於你，有志氣的好孩子。

sentences.english: A man of character does not rail at his fate.
sentences.chinese: 一個有志氣的人是不會抱怨命運的。

sentences.english: I am a person who is ambitious and loves to laugh.
sentences.chinese: 可以說我是個有志氣和喜歡笑的男生。

sentences.english: Our Party has always been adhering to this tradition.
sentences.chinese: 我們黨歷來是有理想，有志氣，不怕“鬼”的。

sentences.english: Of course not, it's infuriating! Why wasn't he this ambitious while with me?
sentences.chinese: 真是氣死人了，爲何他跟我在一起時沒這麼有志氣？

sentences.english: No proud leader in this room wants to ask for aid.
sentences.chinese: 在座任何一位有志氣的領導人都不希望要求得到援助。
